languages.text: {n}Кто-то пораженно восклицает:{/n} "Знамение! Сам Император прислал нам святую аквилу вместе с помазанн{mf|иком|ицей} Его!" {n}Его поддерживают ошеломленные возгласы. Часть бойцов обращает оружие на Комиссара и бросаются в бой.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кто-то пораженно восклицает:{/n} "Знамение! Сам Император прислал нам святую аквилу вместе с помазанн{mf|иком|ицей} Его!" {n}Его поддерживают ошеломленные возгласы. Часть бойцов обращает оружие на Комиссара и бросаются в бой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

{n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jemand ruft voller Ehrfurcht:{/n} "Das ist ein Omen! Der Imperator persönlich schickt den heiligen Aquila zu uns, zusammen mit {mf|Seinem gesalbten Boten|Seiner gesalbten Botin}!" {n}Immer mehr überwältigte Stimmen schließen sich an, und einige Kämpfer heben ihre Waffen gegen den Kommissar und stürzen sich in den Kampf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jemand ruft voller Ehrfurcht:{/n} "Das ist ein Omen! Der Imperator persönlich schickt den heiligen Aquila zu uns, zusammen mit {mf|Seinem gesalbten Boten|Seiner gesalbten Botin}!" {n}Immer mehr überwältigte Stimmen schließen sich an, und einige Kämpfer heben ihre Waffen gegen den Kommissar und stürzen sich in den Kampf.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est un signe ! {n}s'exclame quelqu'un sur un ton émerveillé.{/n} L'Empereur Lui-même nous a envoyé le saint Aquila aux côtés de {mf|Son messager|Sa messagère} ! » {n}Alors que d'autres voix stupéfaites lui font écho, certains combattants braquent leurs armes sur le commissaire et se lancent à l'attaque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est un signe ! {n}s'exclame quelqu'un sur un ton émerveillé.{/n} L'Empereur Lui-même nous a envoyé le saint Aquila aux côtés de {mf|Son messager|Sa messagère} ! » {n}Alors que d'autres voix stupéfaites lui font écho, certains combattants braquent leurs armes sur le commissaire et se lancent à l'attaque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有人充满敬畏地高喊起来。{/n}“这是个预兆！帝皇亲自派来了祂的双头鹰！祂把祂的神选者派到我们身边了！”{n}其他人也惊呆了，不约而同地高喊起来。一部分战士将手中的武器对准了政委，冲进了战场。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有人充满敬畏地高喊起来。{/n}“这是个预兆！帝皇亲自派来了祂的双头鹰！祂把祂的神选者派到我们身边了！”{n}其他人也惊呆了，不约而同地高喊起来。一部分战士将手中的武器对准了政委，冲进了战场。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alguien grita sobrecogido:{/n} «¡Es una señal! ¡El mismo Emperador ha enviado al Aquila sagrada junto con Su mensajer{mf|o|a} ungid{mf|o|a}!». {n}Cuando las voces fascinadas se convierten en un coro, varios de los guerreros apuntan al Comisario y cargan a la batalla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alguien grita sobrecogido:{/n} «¡Es una señal! ¡El mismo Emperador ha enviado al Aquila sagrada junto con Su mensajer{mf|o|a} ungid{mf|o|a}!». {n}Cuando las voces fascinadas se convierten en un coro, varios de los guerreros apuntan al Comisario y cargan a la batalla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}誰かが驚嘆の声をあげた。{/n}「これは前兆だ！皇帝陛下ご自身が、聖別されし使者を送ってくださり、聖なるアクィラを私たちに送ってくださったのだ！」{n}呆然とした声がさらに重なり、数名の戦士たちが武器をコミッサーに向け、戦闘に突入した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}誰かが驚嘆の声をあげた。{/n}「これは前兆だ！皇帝陛下ご自身が、聖別されし使者を送ってくださり、聖なるアクィラを私たちに送ってくださったのだ！」{n}呆然とした声がさらに重なり、数名の戦士たちが武器をコミッサーに向け、戦闘に突入した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Biri hayretle haykırıyor.{/n} "Bu bir alamet! İmparator Hazretleri, kutsal Çift Başlı Kartal'ı kutsanmış elçisiyle birlikte bize gönderdi!" {n}Şaşkın nidalar çoğalınca bir kısım dövüşçü, silahlarını Komiser'e çevirip hücuma kalkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Someone exclaims in awe,{/n} "It's an omen! The Emperor Himself has sent the holy Aquila to us along with His anointed messenger!" {n}As more stunned voices join in, a number of fighters turn their weapons against the Commissar and charge into battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Biri hayretle haykırır.{/n} "Bu bir alamet! İmparator Hazretleri, kutsal Çiftbaş’ı kutsanmış elçisiyle birlikte bize gönderdi!" {n}Şaşkın nidalar çoğalınca bir kısım dövüşçü, silahlarını Komiser'e çevirip hücuma kalkar.{/n}
